source_objects.title: 3D & Animation
source_objects.description: Learn the XYZ of 3D and animation design using Autodesk Maya, Revit, Adobe After Effects, and more.

items.title: Learn UV Mapping with Blender for Game Development

visible_instructors.name: 3dmotive
visible_instructors.title: 3dmotive LLC
visible_instructors.job_title: High Quality 3d and Game Art Training by Industry Pros!

items.headline: Learn to Unwrap and Texture Game Assets Like a Pro with Blender!
objectives_summary: How to Unwrap objects using multiple methods
Understand core unwrapping and texturing principles
See tips and tricks for optimizing and streamlining unwraps

items.title: After Effects Masterclass: The Ultimate Guide for Beginners

visible_instructors.name: Ozgur
visible_instructors.title: Ozgur Gorgun
visible_instructors.job_title: Motion Designer / Adobe & Maxon Certified Instructor

items.headline: Learn how to use the industry standard motion graphics, animation and visual effects software with this course
objectives_summary: Create eye-catching motion graphics, animations and visual effects
Text animation
Motion graphics

items.title: Animated Infographics With After Effects
items.headline: Learn to design and animate infographics using the After Effects software
objectives_summary: Design infographics with After Effects
Animate infographics with After Effects

items.title: 3D Modeling from zero to Professional with 3D Max
items.headline: Become a professional 3D modeler from scratch and start making high quality and realistic 3d models .
objectives_summary: create almost any 3d model they can imagine and also they can easily find jobs and projects about 3d modeling and start to make money . Also after this course there is another course about 3d rendering so you can start that course to increase your skills in 3d design and find better projects with more money

items.title: The Shining - Learn Blender for Production
items.headline: A Blender tutorial based on the elevator scene in The Shining.
objectives_summary: I'm no longer supporting this course. If you're new to the course and want to try it with the newest version of Blender, go ahead. However, it uses Blender 2.79 I believe and is outdated. I can't support this course with the newest versions.

items.title: After Effects - Make 10 Motion Graphics projects right away!

visible_instructors.name: Andrew
visible_instructors.title: Andrew Pach
visible_instructors.job_title: Engaged and Passionate PowerPoint & After Effects instructor

items.headline: After Effects can only be learnt by working in it! Design 10+ animated motion graphics in after effects to get rollin'
objectives_summary: Learn by doing - the most engaging way to learn After Effects
Create at least 10 real-life ready to use After Effects projects
Get familiar with a professional design workflow for motion graphics

items.title: Photoshop: Quick & Easy Animation Like a Professional
items.headline: Become an animator by the end of today even if you "can't draw." Take your videos to new heights using Adobe Photoshop
objectives_summary: Harness the power of Photoshop to make simple or complex 2-D animations.
Animate and draw directly over video clips to enhance or completely transform them.
Access a full array of public domain and royalty-free still image and video resources to use in your own unique projects.

items.title: Design a Gift Box in Fusion 360
items.headline: Sharpen your Fusion 360 skills while modeling a beautiful gift box that can be 3D printed.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course you should feel more confident in your design skills and ability to start creating your own models with Fusion 360.

items.title: Arnold, Maya, Nuke - Intro to 3D Rendering Live Action VFX
items.headline: 3D Render photorealistic CGI in Arnold with your filmed footage! Bring visual effects into the real world using Maya.
objectives_summary: Lighting and Shading a CG Object to match a real scene
Using HDRIs to light an object
Creating water drips on the surface of CG

items.title: The Ultimate Blender 3D Environments Course
items.headline: Create Awesome Environments in Blender
objectives_summary: Students will learn how to create environments and by the end of this course will be able to create their own environments
Students will learn about modeling, texturing, nodes, compositing, addons and much more to create their scenes!

items.title: 3D Character Creation in Cinema 4D: Modeling a 3D Robot
items.headline: Model, texture and render a cool 3D robot in Cinema 4D.
objectives_summary: Model beatutiful and cool looking 3D robots.
Understand the character modeling pipeline in Cinema 4D.
Create 3D objects and characters that are animation friendly.

items.title: Blender 2.8: Your first step - Get the basics right
items.headline: Up and running fast in Blender 2.8: Modeling, Camera, lighting, shading and Rendering variations of your model
objectives_summary: The interface
How to model using reference images
Set Camera using the rule of thirds

items.title: Spline Modeling Fundamentals in CINEMA 4D

items.headline: Everything you need to know about spline modeling in CINEMA 4D
objectives_summary: Model 3D objects using the spline primitives
Model 3D objects using spline modeling techniques

items.title: Stop Motion Essentials
items.headline: Complete guide on creating Stop Motion Animation from scratch in a budget; covering from software to hardware to more.
objectives_summary: You will be able to execute three different types of Stop Motion Animation and have in depth knowledge of how to become more creative and innovative with future projects of Stop Motion Animation.
You will become fluent in professional video editing software
You will have in depth knowledge of a DSLR and how to use it in manual settings.

items.title: Blender 2.8 for 3D Printing (2020)- Workflow & 5 Effects
items.headline: Learn 3D Design for 3D Printing with Blender 2.8
objectives_summary: Design Fundamentals for 3D Printing
Basics of 3D Modeling for 3D Printer
Beginner Prototyping for 3D Printed Products

items.title: Blender and Motion Capture
items.headline: Learn how to use Motion Capture animations in Blender
objectives_summary: Use Motion Capture data in Blender to create character animations
